title: Single Disc Scrubber D-15P
description: The Dynaclean Industries Floor Scrubber Machine D-15P is a powerful and efficient single disc scrubber designed for professional cleaning applications in commercial and industrial spaces. Built with a robust motor and user-friendly controls, this floor scrubber machine ensures deep cleaning performance with minimal effort. Ideal for daily use, the D-15P Floor Scrubber Machine can be operated on various floor types including marble, tile, concrete, and epoxy surfaces. Its ergonomic design and durable build make it perfect for maintaining high-traffic areas such as airports, metro stations, hospitals, offices, and shopping malls. With superior scrubbing action and easy maneuverability, the Dynaclean D-15P Floor Scrubber Machine guarantees clean, shiny, and hygienic floors every time. It’s the perfect combination of performance, reliability, and ease of use — making it an ideal choice for modern cleaning professionals.
keyFeatures: Powerful Cleaning – High-performance 1.5 HP motor and 175 RPM brush speed deliver consistent cleaning.
User-Friendly – Easy to use with adjustable handle, easy water release, and intuitive controls.
Built-in Water Tank – 10L onboard capacity for continuous and efficient cleaning.
Extended Reach – 12-meter long power cord eliminates battery hassles; just plug and clean.
High-Performance Brushes – Equipped with durable brushes for effortless floor maintenance.
Versatile Application – Best suited for commercial spaces, malls, hospitals, hotels, and industrial cleaning.
Deep Cleaning – D-15P's 50 KG brush pressure ensures effective removal of deep stains.
Easy Maintenance – Designed for fast, low-effort maintenance to keep operations running smoothly.
